Replace.Text: New Civilization and Leader - Queen Amanitore of Nubia
Contains a new civilization and leader as well as a new world wonder.
Can you become the dominant empire in the Nile River valley? Lasts no more than 125 Turns.

In this 125-turn scenario, you must expand your empire up and down the Nile River valley competing to become the people most blessed by the great god Amun. Build 7 temples to his glory and victory is yours!
